title: Airwheel Maple Pro Electric Skateboards Complete M3
text: Airwheel Maple Pro Electric Skateboards Complete M3 , 24 October 2015 -- Skateboarding is well recognized as the origin of modern extreme sports.Skateboarding is well recognized as the origin of modern extreme sports. Based on such characteristics as entertaining, exciting, and challenging, skateboarding is developing rapidly and becoming a new way of relaxation for modern young people. At present, Airwheel has rolled out the new maple electric skateboards M3. Airwheel M3 is a combination of traditional skateboards and advanced technologies. It will become the new favorite of young people in the near future. Skateboarding is characterized by sliding and advocating freedom. It helps players experience the feelings of super gravity. However, traditional skateboarding completely depends on player’s strength and skills. Sometimes some players will feel so tired. Nevertheless, each Airwheel M3 is equipped with a wireless remote control. The effective distance of M3’s wireless remote control is 10m. With the help of them, users can easily control the speed and directions of the scooters. Then users won’t feel so tired if they have long-distance trips with M3. Apart from that, Airwheel wireless remote control skateboards M3 are still different from traditional skateboards in the appearance . The difference is that the wheels of Airwheel M3 are much bigger than traditional skateboards. Airwheel has applied the famous customized Cheng Shin tyres to motorized skateboards M3. The high-end tyres have very good skid resistance and abrasion resistance. They make users’ trips on M3 smoother and safer. What’s more, Airwheel complete skateboards M3 are driven by the green energy, electricity. Airwheel electric skateboards M3 have adopted the original Sony lithium batteries, which are safer, greener, and more non-toxic than ordinary batteries. The battery capacity is up to 163 KWh. Users can ride Airwheel skateboards M3 to do sports at leisure time, regarding them as advanced transport tools. M3 will become the new darling of young people soon. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world.
